qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.title: Full E2E Chromium run fails in most suites
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.details: Playwright full run on 2026-02-10 after clean restart ended with 35 tests: 28 failed, 6 passed, 1 skipped. Core pass signal exists (a11y + agent registration + agents), but broad instability remains.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-hub-healthcheck-timeou.title: waitForHub in tests/utils.ts times out and cascades failures
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-hub-healthcheck-timeou.details: Many suites fail in beforeEach/login with `Hub healthcheck failed for http://localhost:5500` and timeout at tests/utils.ts:18. This is the dominant shared blocker across auth, teams, templates, LLM, and stress suites.

qa-2026-02-10-auth-suite-regression-clus.title: Auth-related suites unstable after first failures
qa-2026-02-10-auth-suite-regression-clus.details: auth.spec.ts (4/4 failed), auth-rate-limit, auth-password, and auth-mfa fail in full run. Signals include login/setup timeouts, missing settings/MFA UI assertions, and likely shared state/isolation issues.

qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.title: Audit logs E2E does not render expected seeded rows
qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.details: audit-logs.spec.ts fails on missing `user-0`/`user-1` rows after mocked/seeded load. Needs deterministic fixture setup and stronger wait condition before asserting table content.

qa-2026-02-10-settings-mfa-ui-assertions.title: Settings and MFA UI checks are brittle under current startup timing
qa-2026-02-10-settings-mfa-ui-assertions.details: auth-password waits for networkidle and misses expected settings text; auth-mfa fails on missing `.qr-code img`. Revisit page readiness and selectors to avoid transient false negatives.

qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.title: LLM suites need clear separation of mock and live-provider paths
qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.details: llm-config, llm-generate, and templates-ai fail in full run; live LM test is skipped while non-live tests still fail under shared startup/login instability. Define deterministic contracts and explicit provider gating.

qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.title: Teams and templates API E2E flows fail end-to-end
qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.details: team-types-roles, teams CRUD, and templates CRUD suites fail consistently in full run, mostly after login/bootstrap phase. Needs reliable environment readiness and API fixture isolation per suite.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-log-noise-404-endpoint.title: Reduce recurring 404 noise for /events and /stats/history
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-log-noise-404-endpoint.details: Full run logs repeatedly emit 404 for `/events?token=...` and `/stats/history`; this is mostly non-blocking but obscures true failures and complicates triage.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.title: E2E global setup spends time on repeated pip install
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.details: global-setup still runs dependency checks/install each execution, increasing cycle time and masking signal in rapid debug runs. Add skip/caching strategy for local iterations.

qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.title: Redis vm.overcommit_memory host warning
qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.details: Redis continues to warn about vm.overcommit_memory=0. Non-blocking for this run, but should be corrected in host setup to avoid pressure-related instability.
